title: Shopping at a Clothing Store
description: Listen to a conversation between a customer and a store assistant.

audio.text: Assistant: Good afternoon! Can I help you with anything? [PAUSE] Customer: Yes, I'm looking for a jacket. Something casual. [PAUSE] Assistant: Of course. What size are you? [PAUSE] Customer: I'm usually a medium. [PAUSE] Assistant: Here are some nice jackets. This blue one is very popular. [PAUSE] Customer: I like it. How much is it? [PAUSE] Assistant: It's 80 dollars, but today we have a 25% discount. So it's 60 dollars. [PAUSE] Customer: That's a good price! Can I try it on? [PAUSE] Assistant: Sure. The fitting room is on your left. [PAUSE] Customer: Perfect, it fits well. I'll take it. [PAUSE] Assistant: Great choice! Will you pay by cash or card? [PAUSE] Customer: Card, please. [PAUSE] Assistant: Here's your receipt. Thank you for shopping with us!
